/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape.

In the distance, mountains rise majestically, their peaks touching the sky. A flock of birds can be seen flying over these mountains, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.

Despite the bustling cityscape, there's a sense of tranquility that pervades the scene, perhaps due to the absence of people or the harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. It's a snapshot of a moment, frozen in time, offering a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
